sentences.en: B : Hey , I'm a graffiti artist so it's cool.
sentences.cn: 嘿, 我是涂鸦艺术家,这样才酷.

sentences.en: Buildings old and new are thickly covered with graffiti.
sentences.cn: 新老建筑上都有密密麻麻的涂鸦。

sentences.en: Graffiti was scrawled on some of the planks.
sentences.cn: 有些栏杆上歪歪扭扭刻着字.

sentences.en: Hola Amigos, this is a great graffiti movie from Barcelona.
sentences.cn: 朋友们好, 这是一部关于巴塞罗拉的非常棒的涂鸦电影.

sentences.en: I guess we just disagree on the value of graffiti.
sentences.cn: 我想我们就只是对涂鸦的价值意见不同罢了.

sentences.en: Police accused him on several counts of graffiti charges.
sentences.cn: 警察控告他收取几个涂鸦作品的费用.

sentences.en: Pompeii's graffiti includes insults, love declarations, and political satire.
sentences.cn: 庞贝的涂鸦包括侮辱言辞 、 爱情宣言和政治嘲讽.

sentences.en: Recently, there has been a trend towards writing graffiti on freight trains.
sentences.cn: 最近很多人又开始了货运列车的涂鸦.

sentences.en: Sections of the Wall are also prone to graffiti and vandalism.
sentences.cn: 长城局部也容易被破坏.

sentences.en: The entrance halls, the stairs, and the doors, are all covered with graffiti.
sentences.cn: 门厅, 楼梯和门上面画满了乱七八糟的东西.

sentences.en: The maintenance programme will additionally seek to keep the sites free of graffiti.
sentences.cn: 这个维护方案还会试图保护这些地点不被涂鸦。

sentences.en: The subway was covered in graffiti.
sentences.cn: 过街地道里涂满了乱七八糟的图画和文字。

sentences.en: The walls are daubed with graffiti.
sentences.cn: 墙上满是乱七八糟的涂鸦。

sentences.en: They all bonded while writing graffiti together.
sentences.cn: 他们都是在一起涂鸦时互相熟识的。

sentences.en: This colorful style of writing is also called graffiti.
sentences.cn: 这种五彩斑斓的文笔形式被称之为涂鸦.

sentences.en: Unlike THX, Graffiti really had an effect on people's lives.
sentences.cn: 不象《THX》, 《风情画》真的对人们的生活产生了影响.

trans.tran_cn: 在墙上的乱涂乱写(graffito的复数形式)
trans.tran_en: rude, humorous, or political writing and pictures on the walls of buildings, trains etc
